darkhistory.physicsÂ¶

physics contains useful physics functions as well as constants.

Constants - Fundamental

mp Proton mass in eV.
me Electron mass in eV.
hbar hbar in eV s.
c Speed of light in cm/s.
kB Boltzmann constant in eV/K.
alpha Fine structure constant.
ele Electron charge in C.

Constants - Atomic and Optical

thomson_xsec Thomson cross section in cm^2.
stefboltz Stefan-Boltzmann constant in eV^-3 cm^-2 s^2.
rydberg Ionization potential of ground state hydrogen.
lya_eng Lyman alpha transition energy in eV.
lya_freq Lyman alpha transition frequency in Hz.
width_2s1s Hydrogen 2s to 1s decay width in s^-1.
bohr_rad Bohr radius in cm.
ele_rad Classical electron radius in cm.
ele_compton Electron Compton wavelength in cm.

Constants - Cosmology

h h parameter.
H0 Hubble parameter today in s^-1.
omega_m Omega of all matter today.
omega_rad Omega of radiation today.
omega_lambda Omega of dark energy today.
omega_baryon Omega of baryons today.
omega_DM Omega of dark matter today.
rho_crit Critical density of the universe in eV/cm^3.
rho_DM DM density in eV/cm^3.
rho_baryon Baryon density in eV/cm^3.
nB Baryon number density in cm^-3.
YHe Helium abundance by mass.
nH Atomic hydrogen number density in cm^-3.
nHe Atomic helium number density in cm^-3.
nA Hydrogen and helium number density in cm^-3.

Methods

hubble(rs[, H0, omega_m, omega_rad, â¦]) Returns the Hubble parameter at a given redshift.
dtdz(rs[, H0, omega_m, omega_rad, omega_lambda]) Returns dt/dz at a given redshift.
TCMB(rs) Returns the CMB temperature at a given redshift in eV.
get_inj_rate(inj_type, inj_fac) Returns the injection rate function.
photo_ion_rate(rs, eng, xH, xe[, atom]) Returns the photoionization rate.
photo_ion_xsec(eng, species) Returns the photoionization cross section.
tau_sobolev(rs) Returns the Sobolev optical depth.
CMB_spec(eng, temp) Returns the CMB spectrum in number of photons/cm^3/eV.
